message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $10000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go down to $10000. I'm willing to come down a bit to $12500. This is still a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that you're willing to come down, but $12500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11250. Can you consider this price?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I'm willing to come down to $12000, but I'm really not comfortable going lower than that.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  What do you think?
I understand that you're still trying to get a good price, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $11500. Can you consider this price?
